Description: We are a guitar shop and this is used. The Loar LH-279-BK full hollowbody. Super clean, an easy 9.75 or better out of 10 overall. Action is low and buzz free, electronics work perfectly, no issues, just trimming stock. Includes The Loar Monogrammed lightweight hardshell case. From The Loar:The LH-279 begins with a maple top accompanied by select maple back and sides. The mahogany neck has the traditional V-profile familiar to aficionados of classic Golden Age instruments. With a 16" lower bout and a classic 24-3/4" scale, the LH-279 is designed from original Golden Age archtop specs. We've carefully placed our dual P-90 pickups in what we believe are the perfect spots for great tone and versatility. The classic high output and articulate treble response of P-90s are an ideal match to the maple top and maple back and sides, giving players a wide variety of tonal options for a broad spectrum of musical styles.With a classic bone nut, TonePros Kluson tuning machines, vintage matte sunburst or gloss black finishes and two great-sounding P-90 pickups, we've built a guitar that will inspire you with vintage vibe. SPECIFICATIONS & FEATURESITEM:LH-279 DUAL P-90 ARCHTOPTOP:MAPLEBACK & SIDESMAPLENECK:MAHOGANY WITH VINTAGE "V" PROFILEFRETBOARD:BOUND PADAUK (might be rosewood)HEADSTOCK INLAY:"THE LOAR" GOLD DECALFINISH TYPE:MATTE (VINTAGE SUNBURST), GLOSS (BLACK)FINISH OPTIONS:VINTAGE SUNBURST (MATTE), BLACK (GLOSS)TUNING MACHINES:GROVER BUTTERBEANSCALE LENGTH:24-3/4"TRUSS ROD:TWO WAYFRETS:19BINDING:IVORYBRIDGE:COMPENSATED EBONYUPPER BOUT:11-1/2"LOWER BOUT:16"NUT, WIDTH:BONE, 1-3/4"DEPTH:3-3/4"BODY LENGTH:20-1/4"TOTAL LENGTH:40-1/2"PICKUP:2 X THE LOAR P-90CONTROLS:1 VOLUME, 1 TONE
Title: The Loar LH-279-BK Full Hollowbody Gloss Black Dual P-90's Grover Tuners W/Case
